page.title: 06Games we play
page.content: There are lots of games around here and here is some tig,football,netball ,under an apple tree,adventure games, ponies,on the climbing frame,British Bulldog and tennis.Most of the boys play chain tig and the girls play adventure games. In the field the boys play football and the girls play on the climbing frame.When we have P.E the boys play cricket and football and the girls play dodgeball and bean bag games. Out of school most of us play on our bikes. Other games we play include skipping, bubble cars and another game called under the apple tree.
